sentences.en: Bushy - tailed squirrels scurry to find acorns and nuts to hide.
sentences.cn: 大尾巴的松鼠忙着搜寻和贮藏橡果和松子.

sentences.en: Busy boasts chug and scurry about the river - racy speed boat, stolid, snorting tugs.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的船只在河上鸣叫着来来往往 - --高速快艇和笨头笨脑喘着气的拖驳.

sentences.en: Busy boasts chug and scurry about the river racy speedboat, stolid, snorting tugs.
sentences.cn: 繁忙的船只在河上鸣叫着来来往往——高速快艇和笨头笨脑喘着气的拖驳.

sentences.en: Critters scurry about on the forest floor.
sentences.cn: 生物匆忙地跑有关在森林地板上.

sentences.en: He saw the cockroach scurry under it with the gecko far behind struggling to go under.
sentences.cn: 蟑螂急匆匆的从冰箱底下跑过去,壁虎在后面也努力的想要钻过去.

sentences.en: I heard a scurry of footsteps.
I heard the scurry of feet in the hall.
sentences.cn: 我听到大厅里仓皇奔跑的脚步声.

sentences.en: I heard the scurry of feet outside.
sentences.cn: 我听到外面疾走的脚步声.

sentences.en: I jumped on the sofa after I saw a mouse scurry by.
sentences.cn: 看到一只老鼠匆匆路过,我从沙发上跳了起来.

sentences.en: Make people scurry, or airplanes fly.
sentences.cn: 让人们疾奔, 让飞机飞起.

sentences.en: People were scurrying off to work.
sentences.cn: 人们急匆匆赶着去上班。

sentences.en: The hedgehog only comes out at night to scurry around for a meal.
sentences.cn: 刺猬只在夜间出来,到处匆匆地转,找寻食物.

sentences.en: The mouse scurry into its hole when the cat appear.
sentences.cn: 猫一出来的时候,老鼠便匆匆跑进洞里去了.

sentences.en: There was a great scurry for bargains.
sentences.cn: 大家急忙着去抢购特价品.

sentences.en: There was a great scurry for the best seller.
sentences.cn: 很多人奔窜去买畅销书.

sentences.en: They hurry - scurry a white flag after we warned.
sentences.cn: 我们发出警告之后,他们便惊慌失措地扯起了白旗.

trans.tran_cn: 急跑；短距离赛跑（或赛马）
急赶, 急跑, 急转, 以轻快而交替的步子走动
trans.tran_en: to move quickly with short steps, especially because you are in a hurry

trans.tran_cn: 急匆匆地走，使急赶，催促

trans.tran_en: to move quickly with short steps, especially because you are in a hurry
